name: Pesto Pasta with Roasted Brussel Sprouts and Tempeh Sausage
description: This Pesto Pasta with Roasted Brussel Sprouts and Tempeh Sausage is a hearty, satisfying plant based meal.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups raw cashews (soaked in hot water for 20 minutes to an hour)

itemListElement.text: Add all the pesto ingredients to a food processor and process until smooth. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: Add all the pesto ingredients to a food processor and process until smooth. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Trim and half your brussel sprouts.
itemListElement.name: Trim and half your brussel sprouts.

itemListElement.text: Use a silicone mat, parchment paper or lightly spray a sheet pan with olive oil.
itemListElement.name: Use a silicone mat, parchment paper or lightly spray a sheet pan with olive oil.

itemListElement.text: Place the brussel sprouts cut side down on the sheet pan.
itemListElement.name: Place the brussel sprouts cut side down on the sheet pan.

itemListElement.text: Spray lightly with olive oil, if desired. Can omit for oil-free.
itemListElement.name: Spray lightly with olive oil, if desired. Can omit for oil-free.

itemListElement.text: While the brussel sprouts are roasting, make the tempeh sausage.
itemListElement.name: While the brussel sprouts are roasting, make the tempeh sausage.

itemListElement.text: Add the cubed tempeh to a small pan and add enough water to barely cover it.
itemListElement.name: Add the cubed tempeh to a small pan and add enough water to barely cover it.

itemListElement.text: Over medium heat, simmer the tempeh until almost all of the water is absorbed, about 10 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Over medium heat, simmer the tempeh until almost all of the water is absorbed, about 10 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Now add the rest of the tempeh sausage ingredients and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Now add the rest of the tempeh sausage ingredients and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Boil pasta according to package instructions and drain.
itemListElement.name: Boil pasta according to package instructions and drain.

itemListElement.text: Add the pasta back to the pot you cooked it in. Now add the pesto sauce, tempeh sausage, and roasted brussel sprouts.
itemListElement.name: Add the pasta back to the pot you cooked it in. Now add the pesto sauce, tempeh sausage, and roasted brussel sprouts.

itemListElement.text: Serve warm! If it seems too thick, add a little bit of water to thin out.
